title: How is weed farming destroying the planet? - Quora

response.answer_text: LMFAO. Are you serious? The cannabis plant rejuvenates soil. What is destroying our planet is industrial-scaled agriculture and livestock farming for the last 100 years or so. What that “Michael Bichard” said, describes exactly what industrial agriculture/livestock farming has been doing for decades, not “cannabis” that has only been commercially grown in the last decade or so. Most cannabis producers are generally environmentally conscious, unlike profiteering industrial dirtbags destroying habitats/ecosystems/environment to expand farming operations and gain more profit. Cannabis growers do not use “bio-sludge” fertilizers (made from human sewage and whatever gets flushed down toilets). But do you know who does? Industrial agriculture farms.
